query:
SELECT 'flock_daily_records' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM flock_daily_records WHERE flockId = 810001
UNION ALL SELECT 'reminders', COUNT(*) FROM reminders WHERE flockId = 810001
UNION ALL SELECT 'flock_vaccination_schedules', COUNT(*) FROM flock_vaccination_schedules WHERE flockId = 810001
UNION ALL SELECT 'flock_stress_pack_schedules', COUNT(*) FROM flock_stress_pack_schedules WHERE flockId = 810001
UNION ALL SELECT 'vaccination_schedules', COUNT(*) FROM vaccination_schedules WHERE flockId = 810001
UNION ALL SELECT 'health_records', COUNT(*) FROM health_records WHERE flockId = 810001
UNION ALL SELECT 'mortality_records', COUNT(*) FROM mortality_records WHERE flockId = 810001
UNION ALL SELECT 'procurement_schedules', COUNT(*) FROM procurement_schedules WHERE flockId = 810001
